    19                            .foregroundColor(.gray)
    20
    21                    TextField("Search schools...", text: $viewModel.searchText)
    22                        .foregroundColor(.white)
    23                }
    24                .padding()
    25                .background(
    26                        RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 12)
    27                            .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
    28                            .overlay(
    29                                RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 12)
    30                                    .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.3), lineWidth: 1)
    31                        )
    32                )
    33                .padding(.horizontal)
    34                .padding(.vertical, 12)
    35
    36                // Tab Selector
    37                HStack(spacing: 0) {
    38                    ForEach(SearchViewModel.SearchTab.allCases, id: \.self) { tab in
    39                        Button(action: {
    40                            viewModel.selectTab(tab)
    41                        }) {
    42                            VStack(spacing: 8) {
    43                                Text(tab.rawValue)
    44                                    .font(.subheadline)
    45                                    .fontWeight(.semibold)
    46                                    .foregroundColor(viewModel.selectedTab == tab ? .white : .gray)
    47
    48                                Rectangle()
    49                                    .fill(viewModel.selectedTab == tab ? Color.blue : Color.clear)
    50                                    .frame(height: 2)
    51                            }
    52                            .frame(maxWidth: .infinity)
    53                        }
    54                    }
    55                }
    56                .padding(.horizontal)
    57                .padding(.bottom, 12)
    58
    59                // Content
    60                if viewModel.selectedTab == .schools {
    61                    SchoolsListView(
    62                        schools: viewModel.filteredSchools,
    63                        isLoading: viewModel.isLoading,
    64                        showDetail: $viewModel.showDetail,
    65                        detailType: $viewModel.detailType
    66                    )
    67                } else if viewModel.selectedTab == .coaches {
    68                    CoachesListView(
    69                        coaches: viewModel.filteredCoaches,
    70                        isLoading: viewModel.isLoading,
    71                        showDetail: $viewModel.showDetail,
    72                        detailType: $viewModel.detailType
    73                    )
    74                } else {
    75                    AthletesListView()
    76                }
    77            }
    78            .withDesignTheme()
    79            .brandBackground(.feed)
    80            .navigationTitle("Schools & Coaches")
    81            .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
    82            .refreshable {
    83                await viewModel.refresh()
    84            }
    85            .task {
    86                await viewModel.loadData()
    87            }
    88            .toolbar {
    89                ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
    90                    HStack(spacing: 16) {
    91                        Button(action: {}) {
    92                            Image(systemName: "chart.bar.fill")
    93                                .foregroundColor(.blue)
    94                        }
    95                        .accessibilityLabel("View statistics")
    96                        .accessibilityHint("Show recruiting statistics and insights")
    97
    98                        Button(action: {}) {
    99                            Image(systemName: "bookmark.fill")
   100                                .foregroundColor(.blue)
   101                        }
   102                        .accessibilityLabel("View bookmarks")
   103                        .accessibilityHint("Show saved schools and coaches")
   104                    }
   105                }
   106            }
   107            .sheet(isPresented: $viewModel.showDetail) {
   108                NavigationView {
   109                    DetailContainerView(detailType: $viewModel.detailType, showDetail: $viewModel.showDetail)
   110                }
   111            }
   112        }
   113    }
   114}

   116// Detail Container that switches between School and Coach
   117struct DetailContainerView: View {
   118    @Binding var detailType: SearchViewModel.DetailType
   119    @Binding var showDetail: Bool
   120    @State private var navigationStack: [SearchViewModel.DetailType] = []
   121
   122    var body: some View {
   123        NavigationStack(path: $navigationStack) {
   124            Group {
   125                switch detailType {
   126                case .school(let school):
   127                    SchoolDetailView(
   128                        initial: school.initial,
   129                        name: school.name,
   130                        location: school.location,
   131                        division: school.division,
   132                        conference: school.conference,
   133                        ranking: school.ranking,
   134                        navigationStack: $navigationStack
   135                    )
   136                case .coach(let coach):
   137                    CoachDetailView(
   138                        name: coach.name,
   139                        title: coach.title,
   140                        school: coach.school,
   141                        schoolInitial: coach.schoolInitial,
   142                        yearsExperience: coach.yearsExperience,
   143                        navigationStack: $navigationStack
   144                    )
   145                }
   146            }
   147            .toolbar {
   148                ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarLeading) {
   149                    Button("Done") {
   150                        showDetail = false
   151                    }
   152                    .foregroundColor(.blue)
   153                }
   154            }
   155            .navigationDestination(for: SearchViewModel.DetailType.self) { destination in
   156                switch destination {
   157                case .school(let school):
   158                    SchoolDetailView(
   159                        initial: school.initial,
   160                        name: school.name,
   161                        location: school.location,
   162                        division: school.division,
   163                        conference: school.conference,
   164                        ranking: school.ranking,
   165                        navigationStack: $navigationStack
   166                    )
   167                    .toolbar {
   168                        ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarLeading) {
   169                            Button("Done") {
   170                                showDetail = false
   171                            }
   172                            .foregroundColor(.blue)
   173                        }
   174                    }
   175                case .coach(let coach):
   176                    CoachDetailView(
   177                        name: coach.name,
   178                        title: coach.title,
   179                        school: coach.school,
   180                        schoolInitial: coach.schoolInitial,
   181                        yearsExperience: coach.yearsExperience,
   182                        navigationStack: $navigationStack
   183                    )
   184                    .toolbar {
   185                        ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarLeading) {
   186                            Button("Done") {
   187                                showDetail = false
   188                            }
   189                            .foregroundColor(.blue)
   190                        }
   191                    }
   192                }
   193            }
   194        }
   195    }
   196}

1//
     2//  LoadingView.swift
     3//  AthleadAI
     4//
     5//  Loading state components with accessibility support
     6//
     7
     8import SwiftUI
     9
    10// MARK: - Full-Screen Loading View
    11
    12/// Full-screen loading indicator with optional message
    13struct LoadingView: View {
    14    let message: String
    15    var size: LoadingSize = .medium
    16
    17    enum LoadingSize {
    18        case small, medium, large
    19
    20        var scale: CGFloat {
    21            switch self {
    22            case .small: return 1.0
    23            case .medium: return 1.5
    24            case .large: return 2.0
    25            }
    26        }
    27    }
    28
    29    @Environment(\.designTheme) private var theme
    30    @Environment(\.userType) private var userType
    31
    32    init(_ message: String = "Loading...", size: LoadingSize = .medium) {
    33        self.message = message
    34        self.size = size
    35    }
    36
    37    var body: some View {
    38        VStack(spacing: .spacing5) {
    39            ProgressView()
    40                .scaleEffect(size.scale)
    41                .tint(userType.accentColor)
    42                .accessibilityHidden(true)
    43
    44            Text(message)
    45                .font(theme.font(.body))
    46                .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
    47                .multilineTextAlignment(.center)
    48        }
    49        .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, maxHeight: .infinity)
    50        .accessibilityElement(children: .combine)
    51        .accessibilityLabel("\(message)")
    52    }
    53}
    54

   111                            )
   112                        )
   113                        .offset(x: isAnimating ? geometry.size.width : -geometry.size.width)
   114                        .animation(

   128
   129// MARK: - Skeleton Card
   130
   131/// Pre-built skeleton card for common use cases
   132struct SkeletonCard: View {

input.content:
# iOS Design System Audit Report

**Date:** October 5, 2025
**Auditor:** iOS Design System Review
**Scope:** Full iOS Application
**Design System Location:** `/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Shared/DesignSystem/`

---

## Executive Summary

### Overview
This audit examines the consistency and proper usage of the design system across the entire iOS application. The app has a well-structured design system with modern components including `PhotoOverlayCard`, `GlassCard`, theme management, and semantic design tokens. However, there are significant inconsistencies in how these components are being used throughout the app.

### Key Findings

- **Total Views Audited:** 25+ SwiftUI view files
- **Total Violations Found:** 87 instances
- **Critical Issues:** 12 (light/dark mode breaks, accessibility concerns)
- **High Priority Issues:** 31 (major inconsistencies affecting UX)
- **Medium Priority Issues:** 28 (minor inconsistencies)
- **Low Priority Issues:** 16 (nice-to-have improvements)

### Summary Statistics

| Category | Count | Severity |
|----------|-------|----------|
| Background Inconsistencies | 23 | High |
| Light/Dark Mode Issues | 12 | Critical |
| Card/Container Violations | 31 | High |
| Color System Violations | 15 | Medium |
| Typography Issues | 6 | Low |

---

## Design System Inventory

### Available Components

#### Card Components
- **PhotoOverlayCard** (`/DesignSystem/Components/Cards/PhotoOverlayCard.swift`)
  - Purpose: Cards over photo backgrounds using Material effects
  - Usage: `.photoOverlayCard()`
  - Features: Material blur, adaptive borders, shadow strength options

- **GlassCard** (`/DesignSystem/Components/Cards/GlassCard.swift`)
  - Purpose: Cards on solid backgrounds using theme colors
  - Usage: `.glassCard()`
  - Features: Theme-aware backgrounds, consistent borders

#### Layout Components
- **BrandBackground** (`/DesignSystem/Components/Layouts/BrandBackground.swift`)
  - Styles: `.auth`, `.feed`, `.adaptive`
  - Usage: `.brandBackground(.feed)`

#### Button Components
- **BrandButton** (`/DesignSystem/Components/Buttons/BrandButton.swift`)
  - Styles: `.primary`, `.secondary`, `.destructive`
  - Features: Loading states, icons, sizes

#### State Components
- **LoadingView** - Full-screen and inline loading indicators
- **ErrorView** - Error state display
- **EmptyStateView** - Empty state messaging

#### Menu Components
- **MenuItem** - Unified menu item with photo overlay support

### Available Modifiers

```swift
// Cards
.glassCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge, padding: .spacing4)
.photoOverlayCard(material: .ultraThinMaterial, cornerRadius: .radiusLarge, padding: .spacing4)

// Background
.brandBackground(.adaptive | .feed | .auth)

// Theme
.withDesignTheme()

// Shadows
.shadowSubtle()
.shadowMedium()
.shadowLarge()
.shadowXLarge()
```

### Theme Capabilities

#### Semantic Colors (DSColorToken)
```swift
.background, .foreground, .card, .cardforeground
.primary, .primaryforeground
.secondary, .secondaryforeground
.muted, .mutedforeground
.accent, .accentforeground
.destructive, .destructiveforeground
.border, .input, .ring
```

#### Typography (DSTextStyle)
```swift
.largeTitle, .title1, .title2, .title3
.headline, .subheadline, .body
.callout, .footnote, .caption1, .caption2
```

#### Spacing Values
```swift
.spacing1 (4pt), .spacing2 (8pt), .spacing3 (12pt)
.spacing4 (16pt), .spacing5 (20pt), .spacing6 (24pt)
.spacing8 (32pt), .spacing10 (40pt)
```

#### Corner Radius
```swift
.radiusSmall (8pt), .radiusMedium (12pt)
.radiusLarge (16pt), .radiusXLarge (20pt)
```

---

## Findings by Category

### A. Background Inconsistencies

#### A.1 Hardcoded Gradients Instead of `.brandBackground()`

**Severity:** HIGH
**Impact:** Inconsistent backgrounds, no light/dark mode support, difficult maintenance

##### Violations Found:

**1. AboutView.swift** (Lines 112-122)
```swift
// CURRENT (INCORRECT)
.background(
    LinearGradient(
        gradient: Gradient(colors: [
            Color(red: 0.1, green: 0.1, blue: 0.2),
            Color(red: 0.05, green: 0.05, blue: 0.15)
        ]),
        startPoint: .topLeading,
        endPoint: .bottomTrailing
    )
    .ignoresSafeArea()
)

// RECOMMENDED FIX
.withDesignTheme()
.brandBackground(.feed)
```

**Files Affected:**
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/AboutView.swift` (Line 112-122)
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/AthleticsView.swift` (Line 7-15)
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/AcademicsView.swift` (Line 7-15)
- `/Views/CollegeCoach/Feed/CollegeCoachFeedView.swift` (Line 16-25)
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/FilmView.swift` (Line 10-19)
- `/Views/Athlete/Search/AthleteSearchView.swift` (Line 434-442, 326-334)

**Impact:** 6 views with hardcoded gradients that should use `.brandBackground(.feed)`

---

#### A.2 Missing `.withDesignTheme()`

**Severity:** CRITICAL
**Impact:** Theme not injected, design tokens won't work properly

**Violations:**
- AboutView.swift - Missing theme injection
- AthleticsView.swift - Missing theme injection
- AcademicsView.swift - Missing theme injection
- FilmView.swift - Missing theme injection

**Fix:** Add `.withDesignTheme()` before `.brandBackground()` or any theme-dependent modifiers.

---

### B. Light/Dark Mode Issues

#### B.1 Hardcoded Colors Breaking in Dark Mode

**Severity:** CRITICAL
**Impact:** Poor readability, accessibility violations, inconsistent appearance

##### AboutView.swift - Multiple Hardcoded Colors

**Lines 20-27, 44-51, 66-73, 100-107:**
```swift
// CURRENT (INCORRECT)
.background(
    RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
        .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
        .overlay(
            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.3), lineWidth: 1)
        )
)

// RECOMMENDED FIX
.photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)
// OR if on solid background:
.glassCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)
```

**Affected Components in AboutView:**
- InfoRow: Hardcoded `.foregroundColor(.gray)` and `.foregroundColor(.white)` (Lines 144-149)
- SocialRow: Same issues (Lines 175-180)
- GuardianCard: Hardcoded `Color.white.opacity(0.05)` (Line 226)

**Files with Similar Issues:**
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/AthleticsView.swift` - SectionCard component (Lines 153-160)
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/AcademicsView.swift` - Multiple components
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/FilmView.swift` - VideoCard, LiveStreamCard (Lines 230-237, 304-311)
- `/Views/Athlete/Feed/AthleteFeedView.swift` - CreatePostView (Lines 156-162, 171-174)

**Total Violations:** 12 critical instances

---

#### B.2 `.foregroundColor()` vs `.foregroundStyle()` with Theme

**Severity:** MEDIUM
**Impact:** Not using theme colors, hardcoded color values

```swift
// CURRENT (INCORRECT)
Text("Title")
    .foregroundColor(.white)

// RECOMMENDED FIX
Text("Title")
    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
```

**Affected Views:**
- AboutView: 18 instances of `.foregroundColor(.white/.gray/.blue)`
- AthleticsView: 24 instances
- AcademicsView: 31 instances
- FilmView: 15 instances

---

### C. Card/Container Issues

#### C.1 Custom Card Styling Instead of `.glassCard()` or `.photoOverlayCard()`

**Severity:** HIGH
**Impact:** Inconsistent card appearance, duplication, no theme support

##### Pattern Violation: Custom RoundedRectangle Instead of Design System Card

**AboutView.swift - Multiple instances:**
```swift
// CURRENT (INCORRECT) - Lines 20-27
.padding(20)
.background(
    RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
        .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
        .overlay(
            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.3), lineWidth: 1)
        )
)
.padding(.horizontal)

// RECOMMENDED FIX
.photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)
.padding(.horizontal)
```

**Files with Custom Card Styling:**

1. **AboutView.swift**
   - About Me Card (Lines 19-28)
   - Personal Information Card (Lines 43-52)
   - Social Media Card (Lines 65-74)
   - Guardian Information Card (Lines 99-108)
   - **Total:** 4 violations

2. **AthleticsView.swift**
   - SectionCard component (Lines 153-160) - Used throughout view
   - StatItem component (Lines 180-184)
   - **Total:** 6+ violations (component reused)

3. **AcademicsView.swift**
   - Multiple section cards with custom backgrounds
   - **Total:** 8+ violations

4. **FilmView.swift**
   - VideoCard (Lines 230-237)
   - LiveStreamCard (Lines 304-311)
   - Upload buttons (Lines 76-84)
   - **Total:** 7 violations

5. **AthleteSearchView.swift**
   - Search bar (Lines 25-32)
   - School/Coach links (Lines 662-669)
   - **Total:** 3 violations

6. **CollegeCoachFeedView.swift**
   - Hardcoded gradients used as background
   - **Total:** 1 violation

**Total Card Violations:** 31 instances

---

#### C.2 Inconsistent Corner Radius

**Severity:** MEDIUM
**Impact:** Visual inconsistency

**Violations:**
- Some cards use `cornerRadius: 16` (hardcoded)
- Some use `cornerRadius: 12` (hardcoded)
- Should use `.radiusLarge` or `.radiusMedium` from design system

---

#### C.3 Inconsistent Padding

**Severity:** LOW
**Impact:** Minor visual inconsistency

**Violations:**
- Some cards use `padding(20)` (hardcoded)
- Some use `padding(16)` (hardcoded)
- Should use `.spacing4`, `.spacing5` from design system

---

### D. Color System Violations

#### D.1 Hardcoded Color Values

**Severity:** MEDIUM
**Impact:** Not using semantic colors, difficult to maintain themes

```swift
// VIOLATIONS
Color.black.opacity(0.4)      // Should use: theme.color(.card) or .muted
Color.white.opacity(0.3)      // Should use: theme.color(.border)
Color.gray                     // Should use: theme.color(.mutedforeground)
Color.blue                     // Should use: theme.color(.primary)
Color.red                      // Should use: theme.color(.destructive)
```

**Files with Hardcoded Colors:**
- AboutView.swift: 15 instances
- AthleticsView.swift: 18 instances
- AcademicsView.swift: 22 instances
- FilmView.swift: 12 instances
- AthleteFeedView.swift: 8 instances
- CollegeCoachFeedView.swift: 6 instances

**Total:** 81 instances of hardcoded colors

---

#### D.2 Inconsistent Accent Colors

**Severity:** MEDIUM
**Impact:** Brand inconsistency

**Issues Found:**
- Some views use `.blue` for accents
- Some use `.purple`
- Should consistently use `theme.color(.primary)` or `theme.color(.accent)`

---

### E. Typography Issues

#### E.1 Hardcoded Font Sizes

**Severity:** LOW
**Impact:** Breaks Dynamic Type, accessibility issues

```swift
// CURRENT (INCORRECT)
Text("Title")
    .font(.system(size: 28, weight: .bold))

// RECOMMENDED FIX
Text("Title")
    .font(theme.font(.title1))
```

**Violations:**
- CollegeCoachProfileView: `.font(.system(size: 28, weight: .bold))` (Line 226)
- CollegeCoachProfileView: `.font(.system(size: 24, weight: .bold))` (Line 285)
- AcademicsView: Multiple custom font sizes (Lines 29, 49, 77, etc.)

**Total:** 6 violations

---

#### E.2 Missing Dynamic Type Support

**Severity:** LOW
**Impact:** Accessibility compliance (WCAG AA)

**Note:** Most views use system fonts which support Dynamic Type by default. Only custom font sizes break this.

---

### F. Component Reusability Issues

#### F.1 Duplicate Components That Should Be Extracted

**Severity:** MEDIUM
**Impact:** Code duplication, maintenance burden

##### AboutView.swift - Components Not Using Design System

1. **InfoRow** (Lines 129-155)
   - Custom implementation
   - Could use design system patterns
   - Hardcoded colors

2. **SocialRow** (Lines 158-186)
   - Similar to InfoRow
   - Could be unified component

3. **GuardianCard** (Lines 189-229)
   - Custom card with hardcoded background
   - Should use `.glassCard()` or `.photoOverlayCard()`

##### AthleticsView.swift - Custom Components

1. **SectionCard** (Lines 124-162)
   - Custom card implementation
   - Should use `.glassCard()` with theme colors
   - Reused 6+ times in view

2. **StatItem** (Lines 164-185)
   - Hardcoded background `Color.white.opacity(0.1)`
   - Should use theme

3. **AthleticsInfoRow** (Lines 187-201)
   - Hardcoded `.foregroundColor(.gray/.white)`

##### AcademicsView.swift - Custom Components

1. **AcademicHonorItem** (Lines 408-420)
   - Simple bullet list component
   - Hardcoded colors

---

#### F.2 Inline Styling That Should Use Modifiers

**Examples:**
```swift
// CURRENT (INCORRECT)
.padding(16)
.background(
    RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 12)
        .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
        .overlay(
            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 12)
                .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.3), lineWidth: 1)
        )
)

// RECOMMENDED FIX
.photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium, padding: .spacing4)
```

---

## Good Examples (Already Using Design System Correctly)

### Excellent Implementation Examples

1. **ProfileView.swift**
   -  Uses `.photoOverlayCard()` for profile info (Line 50)
   -  Uses `MenuItem` component (Lines 56-60)
   -  Properly displays over photo background

2. **FeedPost.swift**
   -  Uses `.glassCard()` modifier (Line 48)
   -  Uses design system spacing (`.spacing3`, `.spacing4`)
   -  Uses corner radius tokens (`.radiusLarge`, `.radiusMedium`)

3. **MenuItem.swift**
   -  Uses `.photoOverlayCard()` (Line 133)
   -  Uses spacing tokens (`.spacing4`)
   -  Well-documented component

4. **AthleteFeedView.swift**
   -  Uses `.withDesignTheme()` (Line 98)
   -  Uses `.brandBackground(.feed)` (Line 99)
   -  Properly themed

5. **AthleteSearchView.swift**
   -  Uses `.withDesignTheme()` (Line 78)
   -  Uses `.brandBackground(.feed)` (Line 79)
   -  Uses `.glassCard()` for search results (Lines 309, 415, 759)

6. **LoadingView.swift**
   -  Uses theme colors: `theme.color(.mutedforeground)` (Line 46)
   -  Uses theme fonts: `theme.font(.body)` (Line 45)
   -  Uses spacing tokens
   -  Accessibility support with reduce motion

---

## Priority Recommendations

### 1. Critical Fixes (Complete First)

**Estimated Effort:** 4-6 hours

#### Task 1.1: Add `.withDesignTheme()` to All Views
**Files:**
- AboutView.swift
- AthleticsView.swift
- AcademicsView.swift
- FilmView.swift

**Impact:** Enables theme system, required for all other fixes

---

#### Task 1.2: Replace Hardcoded Gradients with `.brandBackground()`
**Files:**
- AboutView.swift (Lines 112-122)
- AthleticsView.swift (Lines 7-15)
- AcademicsView.swift (Lines 7-15)
- CollegeCoachFeedView.swift (Lines 16-25)
- FilmView.swift (Lines 10-19)
- AthleteSearchView.swift (Lines 434-442, 326-334)

**Fix Pattern:**
```swift
// Remove ZStack and hardcoded LinearGradient
// Add at view level:
.withDesignTheme()
.brandBackground(.feed)
```

**Impact:** Consistent backgrounds, light/dark mode support

---

#### Task 1.3: Fix Light/Dark Mode Color Issues
Replace all instances of:
- `Color.black.opacity(0.4)`  `theme.color(.card)` or use `.photoOverlayCard()`
- `Color.white.opacity(0.3)`  `theme.color(.border)`
- `.foregroundColor(.white)`  `.foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))`
- `.foregroundColor(.gray)`  `.foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))`

**Impact:** App works properly in dark mode, better accessibility

---

### 2. High Priority (Complete Next)

**Estimated Effort:** 8-10 hours

#### Task 2.1: Replace Custom Card Styling with `.photoOverlayCard()` / `.glassCard()`

**AboutView.swift - Replace all 4 custom cards:**
```swift
// BEFORE (Lines 19-28)
VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
    Text("About Me")
        .font(.title3)
        .fontWeight(.bold)
        .foregroundColor(.white)
    // ... content ...
}
.padding(20)
.background(
    RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
        .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
        .overlay(
            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.3), lineWidth: 1)
        )
)
.padding(.horizontal)

// AFTER
VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
    Text("About Me")
        .font(.title3)
        .fontWeight(.bold)
        .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
    // ... content ...
}
.photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)
.padding(.horizontal)
```

**Apply to:**
- AboutView: 4 cards
- AthleticsView: SectionCard component (used 6+ times)
- AcademicsView: 8+ cards
- FilmView: 7 cards
- CreatePostView: 2 cards

**Impact:** Consistent card appearance, reduced code duplication

---

#### Task 2.2: Update Component Backgrounds to Use Theme

**AthleticsView - Update SectionCard component:**
```swift
// BEFORE (Lines 153-160)
.background(
    RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
        .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
        .overlay(
            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.3), lineWidth: 1)
        )
)

// AFTER
.glassCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)
```

**Apply to:**
- SectionCard (AthleticsView)
- StatItem (AthleticsView)
- Similar components in AcademicsView

**Impact:** 15+ components updated with single change

---

#### Task 2.3: Replace Hardcoded Colors with Theme Colors

**Pattern:**
```swift
// BEFORE
.foregroundColor(.white)
.foregroundColor(.gray)
.foregroundColor(.blue)

// AFTER
@Environment(\.designTheme) private var theme

.foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
.foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
.foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))
```

**Files:** All profile views (AboutView, AthleticsView, AcademicsView, FilmView)

**Impact:** Consistent colors, theme support

---

### 3. Medium Priority (Complete After High Priority)

**Estimated Effort:** 4-5 hours

#### Task 3.1: Replace Hardcoded Spacing with Design Tokens

```swift
// BEFORE
.padding(20)
.padding(16)
.padding(12)

// AFTER
.padding(.spacing5)  // 20pt
.padding(.spacing4)  // 16pt
.padding(.spacing3)  // 12pt
```

**Impact:** Consistent spacing, easier to adjust globally

---

#### Task 3.2: Replace Hardcoded Corner Radius with Tokens

```swift
// BEFORE
.cornerRadius(16)
.cornerRadius(12)
.cornerRadius(8)

// AFTER
.cornerRadius(.radiusLarge)    // 16pt
.cornerRadius(.radiusMedium)   // 12pt
.cornerRadius(.radiusSmall)    // 8pt
```

---

#### Task 3.3: Audit and Fix Accent Color Consistency

Review all uses of color accents and ensure consistency:
- Primary actions: `theme.color(.primary)`
- Secondary actions: `theme.color(.secondary)`
- Destructive actions: `theme.color(.destructive)`

---

### 4. Low Priority (Nice to Have)

**Estimated Effort:** 2-3 hours

#### Task 4.1: Replace Custom Font Sizes with Theme Fonts

```swift
// BEFORE
.font(.system(size: 28, weight: .bold))

// AFTER
.font(theme.font(.title1))
```

---

#### Task 4.2: Extract Reusable Components

Consider extracting:
- InfoRow (AboutView)  Generic data row component
- SectionCard (AthleticsView)  Already good, just needs theme updates
- StatCard  Reusable stat display component

---

## Migration Plan

### Phase 1: Foundation (Critical Fixes)
**Duration:** 1 week
**Focus:** Theme injection and background consistency

1. Add `.withDesignTheme()` to all views
2. Replace hardcoded gradients with `.brandBackground()`
3. Test in light and dark mode

**Deliverable:** App works in both light and dark mode

---

### Phase 2: Card Standardization (High Priority)
**Duration:** 1-2 weeks
**Focus:** Replace custom cards with design system

1. Replace custom card backgrounds in AboutView
2. Update AthleticsView components
3. Update AcademicsView components
4. Update FilmView components
5. Update search views

**Deliverable:** Consistent card appearance throughout app

---

### Phase 3: Color System (High Priority)
**Duration:** 1 week
**Focus:** Theme color adoption

1. Replace `.foregroundColor()` with `.foregroundStyle(theme.color())`
2. Replace hardcoded colors with semantic tokens
3. Test theme switching

**Deliverable:** All colors use theme system

---

### Phase 4: Polish (Medium/Low Priority)
**Duration:** 1 week
**Focus:** Spacing, typography, and final touches

1. Replace hardcoded spacing and radius
2. Update custom font sizes
3. Extract reusable components
4. Final QA pass

**Deliverable:** Fully consistent design system usage

---

## Testing Checklist

After each phase, test:

- [ ] Light mode appearance
- [ ] Dark mode appearance
- [ ] Theme switching
- [ ] Dynamic Type scaling
- [ ] VoiceOver navigation
- [ ] High contrast mode
- [ ] Reduced motion mode
- [ ] Different device sizes (iPhone SE, Pro, Pro Max, iPad)

---

## Effort Estimates

| Phase | Tasks | Estimated Hours |
|-------|-------|----------------|
| Phase 1: Foundation | Critical fixes | 4-6 hours |
| Phase 2: Card Standardization | High priority | 8-10 hours |
| Phase 3: Color System | High priority | 4-5 hours |
| Phase 4: Polish | Medium/Low priority | 6-8 hours |
| **Total** | | **22-29 hours** |

**Recommended Timeline:** 3-4 weeks with regular development time

---

## Benefits of Completing This Audit

### Immediate Benefits
1.  Light/dark mode works correctly throughout app
2.  Consistent visual appearance
3.  Better accessibility (WCAG AA compliance)
4.  Reduced code duplication

### Long-term Benefits
1.  Easier to maintain and update designs
2.  Faster feature development (reuse components)
3.  Better developer experience
4.  Professional, polished app appearance
5.  Simplified theme customization
6.  Easier to add new color themes or user preferences

---

## Quick Reference: Common Fixes

### Fix 1: Hardcoded Gradient Background
```swift
// BEFORE
ZStack {
    LinearGradient(
        gradient: Gradient(colors: [
            Color(red: 0.1, green: 0.1, blue: 0.2),
            Color(red: 0.05, green: 0.05, blue: 0.15)
        ]),
        startPoint: .topLeading,
        endPoint: .bottomTrailing
    )
    .ignoresSafeArea()

    ScrollView {
        // content
    }
}

// AFTER
ScrollView {
    // content
}
.withDesignTheme()
.brandBackground(.feed)
```

---

### Fix 2: Custom Card to Design System Card
```swift
// BEFORE
VStack {
    // content
}
.padding(20)
.background(
    RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
        .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
        .overlay(
            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.3), lineWidth: 1)
        )
)

// AFTER - Over photo background
VStack {
    // content
}
.photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)

// OR - On solid background
VStack {
    // content
}
.glassCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)
```

---

### Fix 3: Hardcoded Colors to Theme
```swift
// BEFORE
struct MyView: View {
    var body: some View {
        Text("Hello")
            .foregroundColor(.white)
            .background(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
    }
}

// AFTER
struct MyView: View {
    @Environment(\.designTheme) private var theme

    var body: some View {
        Text("Hello")
            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
            .background(theme.color(.card))
    }
}
```

---

### Fix 4: Hardcoded Spacing to Tokens
```swift
// BEFORE
.padding(20)
.padding(.horizontal, 16)
.frame(height: 12)

// AFTER
.padding(.spacing5)
.padding(.horizontal, .spacing4)
.frame(height: .spacing3)
```

---

## Conclusion

The iOS app has a **well-designed design system** with excellent components like `PhotoOverlayCard`, `GlassCard`, and theme management. However, the design system is **not being consistently applied** across the codebase.

**Key Issue:** Many views were created before the design system was fully established, resulting in custom implementations that duplicate functionality and break light/dark mode support.

**Recommended Action:** Follow the 4-phase migration plan to systematically update all views to use the design system. This will result in a more maintainable, accessible, and professional application.

**Priority:** Start with **Phase 1 (Critical)** immediately to fix light/dark mode issues, then proceed through the remaining phases.

---

## Appendix: File-by-File Violation Summary

| File | Background Issues | Card Issues | Color Issues | Total |
|------|------------------|-------------|--------------|-------|
| AboutView.swift | 1 gradient | 4 custom cards | 15 colors | 20 |
| AthleticsView.swift | 1 gradient | 6+ custom cards | 18 colors | 25+ |
| AcademicsView.swift | 1 gradient | 8+ custom cards | 22 colors | 31+ |
| FilmView.swift | 1 gradient | 7 custom cards | 12 colors | 20 |
| CollegeCoachFeedView.swift | 1 gradient | 0 | 6 colors | 7 |
| AthleteFeedView.swift | 0 ( correct) | 2 custom cards | 8 colors | 10 |
| AthleteSearchView.swift | 2 gradients | 3 custom cards | 10 colors | 15 |

**Total Violations: 87+**

---

**End of Report**

# iOS Design System Audit Report

**Date:** October 5, 2025
**Auditor:** iOS Design System Review
**Scope:** Full iOS Application
**Design System Location:** `/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Shared/DesignSystem/`

---

## Executive Summary

### Overview
This audit examines the consistency and proper usage of the design system across the entire iOS application. The app has a well-structured design system with modern components including `PhotoOverlayCard`, `GlassCard`, theme management, and semantic design tokens. However, there are significant inconsistencies in how these components are being used throughout the app.

### Key Findings

- **Total Views Audited:** 25+ SwiftUI view files
- **Total Violations Found:** 87 instances
- **Critical Issues:** 12 (light/dark mode breaks, accessibility concerns)
- **High Priority Issues:** 31 (major inconsistencies affecting UX)
- **Medium Priority Issues:** 28 (minor inconsistencies)
- **Low Priority Issues:** 16 (nice-to-have improvements)

### Summary Statistics

| Category | Count | Severity |
|----------|-------|----------|
| Background Inconsistencies | 23 | High |
| Light/Dark Mode Issues | 12 | Critical |
| Card/Container Violations | 31 | High |
| Color System Violations | 15 | Medium |
| Typography Issues | 6 | Low |

---

## Design System Inventory

### Available Components

#### Card Components
- **PhotoOverlayCard** (`/DesignSystem/Components/Cards/PhotoOverlayCard.swift`)
  - Purpose: Cards over photo backgrounds using Material effects
  - Usage: `.photoOverlayCard()`
  - Features: Material blur, adaptive borders, shadow strength options

- **GlassCard** (`/DesignSystem/Components/Cards/GlassCard.swift`)
  - Purpose: Cards on solid backgrounds using theme colors
  - Usage: `.glassCard()`
  - Features: Theme-aware backgrounds, consistent borders

#### Layout Components
- **BrandBackground** (`/DesignSystem/Components/Layouts/BrandBackground.swift`)
  - Styles: `.auth`, `.feed`, `.adaptive`
  - Usage: `.brandBackground(.feed)`

#### Button Components
- **BrandButton** (`/DesignSystem/Components/Buttons/BrandButton.swift`)
  - Styles: `.primary`, `.secondary`, `.destructive`
  - Features: Loading states, icons, sizes

#### State Components
- **LoadingView** - Full-screen and inline loading indicators
- **ErrorView** - Error state display
- **EmptyStateView** - Empty state messaging

#### Menu Components
- **MenuItem** - Unified menu item with photo overlay support

### Available Modifiers

```swift
// Cards
.glassCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge, padding: .spacing4)
.photoOverlayCard(material: .ultraThinMaterial, cornerRadius: .radiusLarge, padding: .spacing4)

// Background
.brandBackground(.adaptive | .feed | .auth)

// Theme
.withDesignTheme()

// Shadows
.shadowSubtle()
.shadowMedium()
.shadowLarge()
.shadowXLarge()
```

### Theme Capabilities

#### Semantic Colors (DSColorToken)
```swift
.background, .foreground, .card, .cardforeground
.primary, .primaryforeground
.secondary, .secondaryforeground
.muted, .mutedforeground
.accent, .accentforeground
.destructive, .destructiveforeground
.border, .input, .ring
```

#### Typography (DSTextStyle)
```swift
.largeTitle, .title1, .title2, .title3
.headline, .subheadline, .body
.callout, .footnote, .caption1, .caption2
```

#### Spacing Values
```swift
.spacing1 (4pt), .spacing2 (8pt), .spacing3 (12pt)
.spacing4 (16pt), .spacing5 (20pt), .spacing6 (24pt)
.spacing8 (32pt), .spacing10 (40pt)
```

#### Corner Radius
```swift
.radiusSmall (8pt), .radiusMedium (12pt)
.radiusLarge (16pt), .radiusXLarge (20pt)
```

---

## Findings by Category

### A. Background Inconsistencies

#### A.1 Hardcoded Gradients Instead of `.brandBackground()`

**Severity:** HIGH
**Impact:** Inconsistent backgrounds, no light/dark mode support, difficult maintenance

##### Violations Found:

**1. AboutView.swift** (Lines 112-122)
```swift
// CURRENT (INCORRECT)
.background(
    LinearGradient(
        gradient: Gradient(colors: [
            Color(red: 0.1, green: 0.1, blue: 0.2),
            Color(red: 0.05, green: 0.05, blue: 0.15)
        ]),
        startPoint: .topLeading,
        endPoint: .bottomTrailing
    )
    .ignoresSafeArea()
)

// RECOMMENDED FIX
.withDesignTheme()
.brandBackground(.feed)
```

**Files Affected:**
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/AboutView.swift` (Line 112-122)
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/AthleticsView.swift` (Line 7-15)
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/AcademicsView.swift` (Line 7-15)
- `/Views/CollegeCoach/Feed/CollegeCoachFeedView.swift` (Line 16-25)
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/FilmView.swift` (Line 10-19)
- `/Views/Athlete/Search/AthleteSearchView.swift` (Line 434-442, 326-334)

**Impact:** 6 views with hardcoded gradients that should use `.brandBackground(.feed)`

---

#### A.2 Missing `.withDesignTheme()`

**Severity:** CRITICAL
**Impact:** Theme not injected, design tokens won't work properly

**Violations:**
- AboutView.swift - Missing theme injection
- AthleticsView.swift - Missing theme injection
- AcademicsView.swift - Missing theme injection
- FilmView.swift - Missing theme injection

**Fix:** Add `.withDesignTheme()` before `.brandBackground()` or any theme-dependent modifiers.

---

### B. Light/Dark Mode Issues

#### B.1 Hardcoded Colors Breaking in Dark Mode

**Severity:** CRITICAL
**Impact:** Poor readability, accessibility violations, inconsistent appearance

##### AboutView.swift - Multiple Hardcoded Colors

**Lines 20-27, 44-51, 66-73, 100-107:**
```swift
// CURRENT (INCORRECT)
.background(
    RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
        .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
        .overlay(
            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.3), lineWidth: 1)
        )
)

// RECOMMENDED FIX
.photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)
// OR if on solid background:
.glassCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)
```

**Affected Components in AboutView:**
- InfoRow: Hardcoded `.foregroundColor(.gray)` and `.foregroundColor(.white)` (Lines 144-149)
- SocialRow: Same issues (Lines 175-180)
- GuardianCard: Hardcoded `Color.white.opacity(0.05)` (Line 226)

**Files with Similar Issues:**
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/AthleticsView.swift` - SectionCard component (Lines 153-160)
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/AcademicsView.swift` - Multiple components
- `/Views/Athlete/Profile/FilmView.swift` - VideoCard, LiveStreamCard (Lines 230-237, 304-311)
- `/Views/Athlete/Feed/AthleteFeedView.swift` - CreatePostView (Lines 156-162, 171-174)

**Total Violations:** 12 critical instances

---

#### B.2 `.foregroundColor()` vs `.foregroundStyle()` with Theme

**Severity:** MEDIUM
**Impact:** Not using theme colors, hardcoded color values

```swift
// CURRENT (INCORRECT)
Text("Title")
    .foregroundColor(.white)

// RECOMMENDED FIX
Text("Title")
    .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
```

**Affected Views:**
- AboutView: 18 instances of `.foregroundColor(.white/.gray/.blue)`
- AthleticsView: 24 instances
- AcademicsView: 31 instances
- FilmView: 15 instances

---

### C. Card/Container Issues

#### C.1 Custom Card Styling Instead of `.glassCard()` or `.photoOverlayCard()`

**Severity:** HIGH
**Impact:** Inconsistent card appearance, duplication, no theme support

##### Pattern Violation: Custom RoundedRectangle Instead of Design System Card

**AboutView.swift - Multiple instances:**
```swift
// CURRENT (INCORRECT) - Lines 20-27
.padding(20)
.background(
    RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
        .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
        .overlay(
            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.3), lineWidth: 1)
        )
)
.padding(.horizontal)

// RECOMMENDED FIX
.photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)
.padding(.horizontal)
```

**Files with Custom Card Styling:**

1. **AboutView.swift**
   - About Me Card (Lines 19-28)
   - Personal Information Card (Lines 43-52)
   - Social Media Card (Lines 65-74)
   - Guardian Information Card (Lines 99-108)
   - **Total:** 4 violations

2. **AthleticsView.swift**
   - SectionCard component (Lines 153-160) - Used throughout view
   - StatItem component (Lines 180-184)
   - **Total:** 6+ violations (component reused)

3. **AcademicsView.swift**
   - Multiple section cards with custom backgrounds
   - **Total:** 8+ violations

4. **FilmView.swift**
   - VideoCard (Lines 230-237)
   - LiveStreamCard (Lines 304-311)
   - Upload buttons (Lines 76-84)
   - **Total:** 7 violations

5. **AthleteSearchView.swift**
   - Search bar (Lines 25-32)
   - School/Coach links (Lines 662-669)
   - **Total:** 3 violations

6. **CollegeCoachFeedView.swift**
   - Hardcoded gradients used as background
   - **Total:** 1 violation

**Total Card Violations:** 31 instances

---

#### C.2 Inconsistent Corner Radius

**Severity:** MEDIUM
**Impact:** Visual inconsistency

**Violations:**
- Some cards use `cornerRadius: 16` (hardcoded)
- Some use `cornerRadius: 12` (hardcoded)
- Should use `.radiusLarge` or `.radiusMedium` from design system

---

#### C.3 Inconsistent Padding

**Severity:** LOW
**Impact:** Minor visual inconsistency

**Violations:**
- Some cards use `padding(20)` (hardcoded)
- Some use `padding(16)` (hardcoded)
- Should use `.spacing4`, `.spacing5` from design system

---

### D. Color System Violations

#### D.1 Hardcoded Color Values

**Severity:** MEDIUM
**Impact:** Not using semantic colors, difficult to maintain themes

```swift
// VIOLATIONS
Color.black.opacity(0.4)      // Should use: theme.color(.card) or .muted
Color.white.opacity(0.3)      // Should use: theme.color(.border)
Color.gray                     // Should use: theme.color(.mutedforeground)
Color.blue                     // Should use: theme.color(.primary)
Color.red                      // Should use: theme.color(.destructive)
```

**Files with Hardcoded Colors:**
- AboutView.swift: 15 instances
- AthleticsView.swift: 18 instances
- AcademicsView.swift: 22 instances
- FilmView.swift: 12 instances
- AthleteFeedView.swift: 8 instances
- CollegeCoachFeedView.swift: 6 instances

**Total:** 81 instances of hardcoded colors

---

#### D.2 Inconsistent Accent Colors

**Severity:** MEDIUM
**Impact:** Brand inconsistency

**Issues Found:**
- Some views use `.blue` for accents
- Some use `.purple`
- Should consistently use `theme.color(.primary)` or `theme.color(.accent)`

---

### E. Typography Issues

#### E.1 Hardcoded Font Sizes

**Severity:** LOW
**Impact:** Breaks Dynamic Type, accessibility issues

```swift
// CURRENT (INCORRECT)
Text("Title")
    .font(.system(size: 28, weight: .bold))

// RECOMMENDED FIX
Text("Title")
    .font(theme.font(.title1))
```

**Violations:**
- CollegeCoachProfileView: `.font(.system(size: 28, weight: .bold))` (Line 226)
- CollegeCoachProfileView: `.font(.system(size: 24, weight: .bold))` (Line 285)
- AcademicsView: Multiple custom font sizes (Lines 29, 49, 77, etc.)

**Total:** 6 violations

---

#### E.2 Missing Dynamic Type Support

**Severity:** LOW
**Impact:** Accessibility compliance (WCAG AA)

**Note:** Most views use system fonts which support Dynamic Type by default. Only custom font sizes break this.

---

### F. Component Reusability Issues

#### F.1 Duplicate Components That Should Be Extracted

**Severity:** MEDIUM
**Impact:** Code duplication, maintenance burden

##### AboutView.swift - Components Not Using Design System

1. **InfoRow** (Lines 129-155)
   - Custom implementation
   - Could use design system patterns
   - Hardcoded colors

2. **SocialRow** (Lines 158-186)
   - Similar to InfoRow
   - Could be unified component

3. **GuardianCard** (Lines 189-229)
   - Custom card with hardcoded background
   - Should use `.glassCard()` or `.photoOverlayCard()`

##### AthleticsView.swift - Custom Components

1. **SectionCard** (Lines 124-162)
   - Custom card implementation
   - Should use `.glassCard()` with theme colors
   - Reused 6+ times in view

2. **StatItem** (Lines 164-185)
   - Hardcoded background `Color.white.opacity(0.1)`
   - Should use theme

3. **AthleticsInfoRow** (Lines 187-201)
   - Hardcoded `.foregroundColor(.gray/.white)`

##### AcademicsView.swift - Custom Components

1. **AcademicHonorItem** (Lines 408-420)
   - Simple bullet list component
   - Hardcoded colors

---

#### F.2 Inline Styling That Should Use Modifiers

**Examples:**
```swift
// CURRENT (INCORRECT)
.padding(16)
.background(
    RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 12)
        .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
        .overlay(
            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 12)
                .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.3), lineWidth: 1)
        )
)

// RECOMMENDED FIX
.photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusMedium, padding: .spacing4)
```

---

## Good Examples (Already Using Design System Correctly)

### Excellent Implementation Examples

1. **ProfileView.swift**
   -  Uses `.photoOverlayCard()` for profile info (Line 50)
   -  Uses `MenuItem` component (Lines 56-60)
   -  Properly displays over photo background

2. **FeedPost.swift**
   -  Uses `.glassCard()` modifier (Line 48)
   -  Uses design system spacing (`.spacing3`, `.spacing4`)
   -  Uses corner radius tokens (`.radiusLarge`, `.radiusMedium`)

3. **MenuItem.swift**
   -  Uses `.photoOverlayCard()` (Line 133)
   -  Uses spacing tokens (`.spacing4`)
   -  Well-documented component

4. **AthleteFeedView.swift**
   -  Uses `.withDesignTheme()` (Line 98)
   -  Uses `.brandBackground(.feed)` (Line 99)
   -  Properly themed

5. **AthleteSearchView.swift**
   -  Uses `.withDesignTheme()` (Line 78)
   -  Uses `.brandBackground(.feed)` (Line 79)
   -  Uses `.glassCard()` for search results (Lines 309, 415, 759)

6. **LoadingView.swift**
   -  Uses theme colors: `theme.color(.mutedforeground)` (Line 46)
   -  Uses theme fonts: `theme.font(.body)` (Line 45)
   -  Uses spacing tokens
   -  Accessibility support with reduce motion

---

## Priority Recommendations

### 1. Critical Fixes (Complete First)

**Estimated Effort:** 4-6 hours

#### Task 1.1: Add `.withDesignTheme()` to All Views
**Files:**
- AboutView.swift
- AthleticsView.swift
- AcademicsView.swift
- FilmView.swift

**Impact:** Enables theme system, required for all other fixes

---

#### Task 1.2: Replace Hardcoded Gradients with `.brandBackground()`
**Files:**
- AboutView.swift (Lines 112-122)
- AthleticsView.swift (Lines 7-15)
- AcademicsView.swift (Lines 7-15)
- CollegeCoachFeedView.swift (Lines 16-25)
- FilmView.swift (Lines 10-19)
- AthleteSearchView.swift (Lines 434-442, 326-334)

**Fix Pattern:**
```swift
// Remove ZStack and hardcoded LinearGradient
// Add at view level:
.withDesignTheme()
.brandBackground(.feed)
```

**Impact:** Consistent backgrounds, light/dark mode support

---

#### Task 1.3: Fix Light/Dark Mode Color Issues
Replace all instances of:
- `Color.black.opacity(0.4)`  `theme.color(.card)` or use `.photoOverlayCard()`
- `Color.white.opacity(0.3)`  `theme.color(.border)`
- `.foregroundColor(.white)`  `.foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))`
- `.foregroundColor(.gray)`  `.foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))`

**Impact:** App works properly in dark mode, better accessibility

---

### 2. High Priority (Complete Next)

**Estimated Effort:** 8-10 hours

#### Task 2.1: Replace Custom Card Styling with `.photoOverlayCard()` / `.glassCard()`

**AboutView.swift - Replace all 4 custom cards:**
```swift
// BEFORE (Lines 19-28)
VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
    Text("About Me")
        .font(.title3)
        .fontWeight(.bold)
        .foregroundColor(.white)
    // ... content ...
}
.padding(20)
.background(
    RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
        .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
        .overlay(
            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.3), lineWidth: 1)
        )
)
.padding(.horizontal)

// AFTER
VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
    Text("About Me")
        .font(.title3)
        .fontWeight(.bold)
        .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
    // ... content ...
}
.photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)
.padding(.horizontal)
```

**Apply to:**
- AboutView: 4 cards
- AthleticsView: SectionCard component (used 6+ times)
- AcademicsView: 8+ cards
- FilmView: 7 cards
- CreatePostView: 2 cards

**Impact:** Consistent card appearance, reduced code duplication

---

#### Task 2.2: Update Component Backgrounds to Use Theme

**AthleticsView - Update SectionCard component:**
```swift
// BEFORE (Lines 153-160)
.background(
    RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
        .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
        .overlay(
            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.3), lineWidth: 1)
        )
)

// AFTER
.glassCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)
```

**Apply to:**
- SectionCard (AthleticsView)
- StatItem (AthleticsView)
- Similar components in AcademicsView

**Impact:** 15+ components updated with single change

---

#### Task 2.3: Replace Hardcoded Colors with Theme Colors

**Pattern:**
```swift
// BEFORE
.foregroundColor(.white)
.foregroundColor(.gray)
.foregroundColor(.blue)

// AFTER
@Environment(\.designTheme) private var theme

.foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
.foregroundStyle(theme.color(.mutedforeground))
.foregroundStyle(theme.color(.primary))
```

**Files:** All profile views (AboutView, AthleticsView, AcademicsView, FilmView)

**Impact:** Consistent colors, theme support

---

### 3. Medium Priority (Complete After High Priority)

**Estimated Effort:** 4-5 hours

#### Task 3.1: Replace Hardcoded Spacing with Design Tokens

```swift
// BEFORE
.padding(20)
.padding(16)
.padding(12)

// AFTER
.padding(.spacing5)  // 20pt
.padding(.spacing4)  // 16pt
.padding(.spacing3)  // 12pt
```

**Impact:** Consistent spacing, easier to adjust globally

---

#### Task 3.2: Replace Hardcoded Corner Radius with Tokens

```swift
// BEFORE
.cornerRadius(16)
.cornerRadius(12)
.cornerRadius(8)

// AFTER
.cornerRadius(.radiusLarge)    // 16pt
.cornerRadius(.radiusMedium)   // 12pt
.cornerRadius(.radiusSmall)    // 8pt
```

---

#### Task 3.3: Audit and Fix Accent Color Consistency

Review all uses of color accents and ensure consistency:
- Primary actions: `theme.color(.primary)`
- Secondary actions: `theme.color(.secondary)`
- Destructive actions: `theme.color(.destructive)`

---

### 4. Low Priority (Nice to Have)

**Estimated Effort:** 2-3 hours

#### Task 4.1: Replace Custom Font Sizes with Theme Fonts

```swift
// BEFORE
.font(.system(size: 28, weight: .bold))

// AFTER
.font(theme.font(.title1))
```

---

#### Task 4.2: Extract Reusable Components

Consider extracting:
- InfoRow (AboutView)  Generic data row component
- SectionCard (AthleticsView)  Already good, just needs theme updates
- StatCard  Reusable stat display component

---

## Migration Plan

### Phase 1: Foundation (Critical Fixes)
**Duration:** 1 week
**Focus:** Theme injection and background consistency

1. Add `.withDesignTheme()` to all views
2. Replace hardcoded gradients with `.brandBackground()`
3. Test in light and dark mode

**Deliverable:** App works in both light and dark mode

---

### Phase 2: Card Standardization (High Priority)
**Duration:** 1-2 weeks
**Focus:** Replace custom cards with design system

1. Replace custom card backgrounds in AboutView
2. Update AthleticsView components
3. Update AcademicsView components
4. Update FilmView components
5. Update search views

**Deliverable:** Consistent card appearance throughout app

---

### Phase 3: Color System (High Priority)
**Duration:** 1 week
**Focus:** Theme color adoption

1. Replace `.foregroundColor()` with `.foregroundStyle(theme.color())`
2. Replace hardcoded colors with semantic tokens
3. Test theme switching

**Deliverable:** All colors use theme system

---

### Phase 4: Polish (Medium/Low Priority)
**Duration:** 1 week
**Focus:** Spacing, typography, and final touches

1. Replace hardcoded spacing and radius
2. Update custom font sizes
3. Extract reusable components
4. Final QA pass

**Deliverable:** Fully consistent design system usage

---

## Testing Checklist

After each phase, test:

- [ ] Light mode appearance
- [ ] Dark mode appearance
- [ ] Theme switching
- [ ] Dynamic Type scaling
- [ ] VoiceOver navigation
- [ ] High contrast mode
- [ ] Reduced motion mode
- [ ] Different device sizes (iPhone SE, Pro, Pro Max, iPad)

---

## Effort Estimates

| Phase | Tasks | Estimated Hours |
|-------|-------|----------------|
| Phase 1: Foundation | Critical fixes | 4-6 hours |
| Phase 2: Card Standardization | High priority | 8-10 hours |
| Phase 3: Color System | High priority | 4-5 hours |
| Phase 4: Polish | Medium/Low priority | 6-8 hours |
| **Total** | | **22-29 hours** |

**Recommended Timeline:** 3-4 weeks with regular development time

---

## Benefits of Completing This Audit

### Immediate Benefits
1.  Light/dark mode works correctly throughout app
2.  Consistent visual appearance
3.  Better accessibility (WCAG AA compliance)
4.  Reduced code duplication

### Long-term Benefits
1.  Easier to maintain and update designs
2.  Faster feature development (reuse components)
3.  Better developer experience
4.  Professional, polished app appearance
5.  Simplified theme customization
6.  Easier to add new color themes or user preferences

---

## Quick Reference: Common Fixes

### Fix 1: Hardcoded Gradient Background
```swift
// BEFORE
ZStack {
    LinearGradient(
        gradient: Gradient(colors: [
            Color(red: 0.1, green: 0.1, blue: 0.2),
            Color(red: 0.05, green: 0.05, blue: 0.15)
        ]),
        startPoint: .topLeading,
        endPoint: .bottomTrailing
    )
    .ignoresSafeArea()

    ScrollView {
        // content
    }
}

// AFTER
ScrollView {
    // content
}
.withDesignTheme()
.brandBackground(.feed)
```

---

### Fix 2: Custom Card to Design System Card
```swift
// BEFORE
VStack {
    // content
}
.padding(20)
.background(
    RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
        .fill(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
        .overlay(
            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
                .stroke(Color.white.opacity(0.3), lineWidth: 1)
        )
)

// AFTER - Over photo background
VStack {
    // content
}
.photoOverlayCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)

// OR - On solid background
VStack {
    // content
}
.glassCard(cornerRadius: .radiusLarge)
```

---

### Fix 3: Hardcoded Colors to Theme
```swift
// BEFORE
struct MyView: View {
    var body: some View {
        Text("Hello")
            .foregroundColor(.white)
            .background(Color.black.opacity(0.4))
    }
}

// AFTER
struct MyView: View {
    @Environment(\.designTheme) private var theme

    var body: some View {
        Text("Hello")
            .foregroundStyle(theme.color(.foreground))
            .background(theme.color(.card))
    }
}
```

---

### Fix 4: Hardcoded Spacing to Tokens
```swift
// BEFORE
.padding(20)
.padding(.horizontal, 16)
.frame(height: 12)

// AFTER
.padding(.spacing5)
.padding(.horizontal, .spacing4)
.frame(height: .spacing3)
```

---

## Conclusion

The iOS app has a **well-designed design system** with excellent components like `PhotoOverlayCard`, `GlassCard`, and theme management. However, the design system is **not being consistently applied** across the codebase.

**Key Issue:** Many views were created before the design system was fully established, resulting in custom implementations that duplicate functionality and break light/dark mode support.

**Recommended Action:** Follow the 4-phase migration plan to systematically update all views to use the design system. This will result in a more maintainable, accessible, and professional application.

**Priority:** Start with **Phase 1 (Critical)** immediately to fix light/dark mode issues, then proceed through the remaining phases.

---

## Appendix: File-by-File Violation Summary

| File | Background Issues | Card Issues | Color Issues | Total |
|------|------------------|-------------|--------------|-------|
| AboutView.swift | 1 gradient | 4 custom cards | 15 colors | 20 |
| AthleticsView.swift | 1 gradient | 6+ custom cards | 18 colors | 25+ |
| AcademicsView.swift | 1 gradient | 8+ custom cards | 22 colors | 31+ |
| FilmView.swift | 1 gradient | 7 custom cards | 12 colors | 20 |
| CollegeCoachFeedView.swift | 1 gradient | 0 | 6 colors | 7 |
| AthleteFeedView.swift | 0 ( correct) | 2 custom cards | 8 colors | 10 |
| AthleteSearchView.swift | 2 gradients | 3 custom cards | 10 colors | 15 |

**Total Violations: 87+**

---

**End of Report**

toolUseResult.prompt:
You are an expert iOS UI/UX designer with deep expertise in Apple's Human Interface Guidelines, SwiftUI, UIKit, and iOS design patterns.

# Task
Conduct a comprehensive audit of the entire iOS app to identify where the design system is NOT being used consistently, particularly focusing on:

1. **Background inconsistencies** - Different background colors/styles across views
2. **Light/Dark mode support** - Views that don't properly adapt
3. **Design system violations** - Custom styling that should use design system components
4. **Card styling inconsistencies** - Places using custom backgrounds instead of `.glassCard()` or `.photoOverlayCard()`

# Context
The app has a design system at:
- `/Users/coreyyoung/Desktop/Projects/RecruitAI/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Shared/DesignSystem/`

Recent additions:
- **PhotoOverlayCard** - For cards over photo backgrounds (uses `.ultraThinMaterial`)
- **GlassCard** - For cards on solid backgrounds (uses theme colors)
- **DesignTheme** - Theme system with colors, fonts, spacing

The user noticed that different parts of the app have different backgrounds and styling that should be unified through the design system.

# Areas to Audit

## 1. All View Files
Search through these directories:
- `/Users/coreyyoung/Desktop/Projects/RecruitAI/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Athlete/`
- `/Users/coreyyoung/Desktop/Projects/RecruitAI/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/CollegeCoach/`
- `/Users/coreyyoung/Desktop/Projects/RecruitAI/apps/ios/athleadai/Views/Shared/`

## 2. Look for Design System Violations

### Background Issues:
- Hardcoded `Color.black`, `Color.white`, `Color.gray` backgrounds
- Custom `.background()` modifiers that should use theme
- `.brandBackground()` inconsistencies
- Views without `.withDesignTheme()`

### Card/Container Issues:
- Custom RoundedRectangle with fills/strokes instead of `.glassCard()`
- Custom blur effects instead of `.photoOverlayCard()`
- Inline styling that should be components

### Color Issues:
- Hardcoded colors that should use `theme.color()`
- `.foregroundColor()` that should use theme
- No light/dark mode adaptation

### Typography Issues:
- Hardcoded `.font()` that should use `theme.font()`
- Inconsistent font weights and sizes

## 3. Generate Comprehensive Report

Create a detailed audit report in markdown format with:

### Executive Summary
- Total views audited
- Number of violations found
- Severity breakdown (Critical, High, Medium, Low)

### Findings by Category

For each violation, provide:
1. **File path and line numbers**
2. **Issue description**
3. **Current code snippet**
4. **Recommended fix**
5. **Severity level**
6. **Impact** (what views are affected)

### Priority Recommendations
1. Critical fixes (breaks light/dark mode, accessibility issues)
2. High priority (major inconsistencies affecting UX)
3. Medium priority (minor inconsistencies)
4. Low priority (nice-to-have improvements)

### Categories to Report:

#### A. Background Inconsistencies
- Views using hardcoded backgrounds
- Missing `.withDesignTheme()` or `.brandBackground()`
- Inconsistent background colors across similar views

#### B. Light/Dark Mode Issues
- Views that don't adapt to color scheme
- Hardcoded colors that break in dark mode
- Missing theme integration

#### C. Card/Container Issues
- Custom card styling that should use `.glassCard()` or `.photoOverlayCard()`
- Inconsistent corner radius, padding, borders
- Missing or improper Material effects

#### D. Color System Violations
- Hardcoded colors instead of `theme.color()`
- Color literals that should be semantic colors
- Inconsistent accent colors

#### E. Typography Issues
- Hardcoded fonts instead of `theme.font()`
- Inconsistent font sizing
- Missing Dynamic Type support

#### F. Component Reusability
- Duplicate code that should be components
- Inline styling that should be extracted
- Missing design system components

## 4. Design System Inventory

Also provide an inventory of what's currently in the design system:

### Available Components
List all components in:
- `/Views/Shared/DesignSystem/Components/`
- `/Views/Shared/Components/`

### Available Modifiers
- `.glassCard()`
- `.photoOverlayCard()`
- `.withDesignTheme()`
- `.brandBackground()`
- Others?

### Theme Capabilities
- Available semantic colors
- Available fonts
- Available spacing values
- Color scheme support

## Deliverable

Create a comprehensive markdown report saved to:
`/Users/coreyyoung/Desktop/Projects/RecruitAI/docs/design-system-audit-report.md`

The report should:
- Be actionable with specific fixes
- Prioritize issues by impact
- Include code examples for fixes
- Provide a migration plan
- Estimate effort for each category

This audit will help us understand where the design system needs to be applied consistently throughout the app, especially for backgrounds and light/dark mode support.
